1.title: Lion King

1.q11: Do you think Simba is excited about being king? Why?

1.q23: Which part is the one Simba should never go to?

script.1: Mufasa: Look, Simba. Everything the light touches is our kingdom.
script.3: Mufasa: A king`s time as ruler rises and falls like the sun. One day, Simba, the sun will set on my time here, and will rise with you as the new king.
script.4: Simba: And this will all be mine?
script.6: Simba: Everything the light touches... What about that shadowy place?
script.7: Mufasa: That`s beyond our borders. You must never go there, Simba.
script.8: Simba: But I thought a king can do whatever he wants.
script.9: Mufasa: Oh, there`s more to being king than getting your way all the time.

script.8: Mary: Please, don't make me go. You can keep home schooling me.

15.title: Brave
15.intro: The movie is about a princess who wants to be free in her life. But her parents want her to listen to the destiny.
15.q01: What do you think perfect parents should to do for their children?
15.q02: Do you think people should get married young? why or why not?
15.description: The king and the queen arranged a betrothal gathering for Merida. In this clip, Merida and the queen had different idea about this.
15.q12: From this clip, do you think they ever talked about this matter face to face?
15.q21: What does Merida think they should "call off the gathering"?
15.q22: According to the queen, what can't we run away from?
15.q23: What was the thing Merida swore to Angus (the horse) at the end?

script.1: Q: Merida, all this work, all the time spent preparing you, schooling you, giving you everything we never had. I ask you, what do you expect us to do?
script.2: M: Call off the gathering. Would that kill them? You're the queen. You can just tell the lords the princess is not ready for this. In fact, she might not ever be ready for this, so that's that. Good day to you. We'll expect your declarations of war in the morning.
script.3: Q: I understand this must all seem unfair. Even I had reservations when I faced betrothal. But we can't just run away from who we are.
script.4: M: I don't want my life to be over. I want my freedom!
script.5: Q: But are you willing to pay the price your freedom will cost?
script.6: M: I'm not doing any of this to hurt you.
script.7: Q: If you could just try to see what I do, I do out of love.
script.8: M: But it's my life, it's…I'm just not ready.
script.9: Q: I think you'd see if you could just…
script.10: M: I think I could make you understand if you would just…
script.13: M: I swear, Angus, this isn't going to happen. Not if I have any say in it.

1.q: What kind of the gathering you may wear formal clothes?

2.q: What is the difference between betrothal and marriage?

3.q: What did you ever swear to yourself about your future?

script.10: Maui: Oh, of course, of course. Yes, yes, yes, yes. Maui always has time for his fans. When you use a bird to write with, it's called tweeting. (laughs) I know, not every day you get a chance to meet your hero.
script.11: Moana: You are not my hero. And I'm not here so you can sign my oar. I'm here because you stole the heart of Te Fiti
script.12: Moana: And you will board my boat, sail across the sea and put it back

1.q: Why is it a bad habit to always interrupt someone?

2.q: Besides a boat, what can you 'board'?

3.q: What is different between a god and demigod?

21.title: Paw patrol
21.intro: Ryder and the pups are called to Adventure City to stop Mayor Humdinger from turning the bustling metropolis into a state of chaos.
21.q01: Do you vote in elections? Why or why not?
21.q02: What is a good quality for a security guard?
21.description: Mayor Humdinger, had recently been elected mayor. Knowing of Humdinger's infamous wrongdoings in Foggy Bottom, a dachshund named Liberty calls the team.
21.q11: Do you think Liberty (the white dog) likes the Mayor?  Why or why not?
21.q12: Why can't Liberty get in that place?
21.q23: What are Butch and Ruben arguing about?

script.1:
Marty Muckraker Reporter :
It's election day in Adventure city.
I'm Marty Muckraker, reporting live from City Square.
In a surprising twist, the leading candidate has dropped out of the race,
leaving only one name on the ticket.
Mayor Humdinger, who has just won by default.
script.2: Liberty: Mayor Humdinger.  Ugh! Just saying it makes my skin crawl.
script.3: Ruben: No dogs. By order of the new mayor.
script.5: Butch: Yeah, you heard him. No dogs.
script.6: Ruben:  He's more of a cat person. Now beat it!
script.7: Liberty:  If those are the rules, those are the rules. You gentlemen have a wonderful day.
script.8: Ruben:  Ha-ha! Did you see that? You gotta show these dogs you're the alpha.
script.9: Butch:  You're not the alpha. I'm the alpha!

1.q: What is a reason do candidates sometimes drop out of elections?

2.q: Who is the mayor of New Taipei City?

3.q: Why things make your skin crawl?

22.title: Zootopia
22.intro: Zootopia is about animal city. The disappearance of animals in this city, officer Judy and her partner are looking for clues.
22.q01: What is difficult about being a police detective?
22.description: This movie shows Nick Wiled was so nervous about the crime boss coming, and why he was scared of him. In the clip, than Nick and Judy caught by polar bear
22.q11: What things did Nick sees and makes him feel afraid?
22.q21: What kind of things does Nick notice in the very beginning?
22.q23: Why doesn't Mr. Big like Nick?

script.1: Nick Wilde: Well, now, wait a minute. Polar bear fur, rat-pack music, fancy cup? I know whose car this is, we gotta go!
script.2: Judy Hopps: Why? Whose car is it?
script.3: Nick Wilde: The most feared crime boss in Tundratown. They call him Mr. Big, and he does not like me, so we gotta go!
script.4: Judy Hopps: I'm not leaving. This is a crime scene.
script.5: Nick Wilde: Well, it's gonna be an even bigger crime scene if Mr. Big finds me here, so we're leaving, right now! Oh, gah! Raymond! And is that Kevin? Long time no see! And speaking of "no see", how about you forget you saw me. Huh? For old time's sake? That's a no.
script.6: Judy Hopps: What did you do that made Mr. Big so mad at you?
script.7: Nick Wilde:  I, um... I may have sold him a very expensive wool rug that was made from the fur of a skunk'ssss... butt.
script.8: Judy Hopps: Oh, sweet cheese and crackers.

1.q: Why do some people like watching crime movies?

2.q: Why do people put rugs in their home?

3.q: When do people use this phrase?
